title: PranRokto ‚Äì Blood Donor Finder Platform (FullStack)
description: PranRokto is a full-stack blood donor finder application built with the MERN stack. It enables users to search for blood donors based on blood group and location, manage donor profiles, and connect through public reviews and chat features. The platform includes secure authentication, Cloudinary image uploads, and a clean, responsive UI.
